column1: List of Projects as per Smart City Proposal : Belagavi

column2:

embedded with Belagavi-One)

column1: Note-  This only indicates cost of individual projects given in the SCP. The total value of SCP may additionally include other costs such as DPR preparation, PMC, O&M etc.
